{"id":474550183,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1617163959,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/474550183/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"17.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isToeplitzMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& matrix) {\n        int m = matrix.size();\n        int n = matrix[0].size();\n        int i = m - 1;\n        int j = 0;\n        while(i != 0 || j != n - 1)\n        {\n            int last_value = matrix[i][j];\n            for(int r = i, c = j; r < m && c < n; r++, c++)\n            {\n                if(last_value != matrix[r][c]) return false;\n                last_value = matrix[r][c];\n            }\n            if(i == 0)\n            {\n                j++;\n                \n            }else\n            {\n                i--;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
